mobiles.name: piton yýlaný
mobiles.long_description: Dev piton kafasýný kaldýrarak sana týslýyor.
mobiles.description: It sways back and forth contemplating whether or not to eat you.

mobiles.name: küçük yýlan
mobiles.long_description: Küçük yeþil bir yýlan yerde sürünüyor.
mobiles.description: It looks harmless enough.  Or is it?

mobiles.name: kýrkayak
mobiles.long_description: Küçük bir kýrkayak burada bitki arýyor.
mobiles.description: It looks completely harmless but who knows for sure?

mobiles.name: kobold
mobiles.long_description: Çirkin bir kobold gýrtlaktan birþeyler mýrýldanýyor.
mobiles.description: It looks ugly enough to scare its own mother.

mobiles.name: ork
mobiles.long_description: Bu orkun aðzýndan köpükler çýkýyor. Uzak dursan iyi olur.
mobiles.description: You notice a slight tinge of madness in his eyes.

mobiles.name: ork
mobiles.long_description: Bu iri ork diþlerini karýþtýrmak için küçük birini arýyor.
mobiles.description: The orc says, "Whatcha look'n at?"

mobiles.name: savaþçý
mobiles.long_description: Bu uzun savaþçýnýn senden daha çok yara izi var.
mobiles.description: He's surely a strong, brainless fighter.  Like you.

mobiles.name: savaþçý
mobiles.long_description: Bu deneyimli savaþçý neredeyse baban yaþýnda.
mobiles.description:
He seems to know his way with weapons.  And he wants
to show you what he can do!

mobiles.name: hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: Küçük bitkin bir hobgoblin köþeye sinmiþ duruyor.
mobiles.description:
Looking into the eyes of this poor soul makes you feel
sad as you see the terror and fear in its eyes.  Why
don't you put it out of its misery?

mobiles.name: yýlan
mobiles.long_description: Hastalýklý bir kahverengi yýlan dikkatle seni izliyor.
mobiles.description: A closer look reveals a hungry demeanor.  Don't get too close!

mobiles.name: kýrkayak
mobiles.long_description: Beyaz bir kýrkayak maðara yüzeyi boyunca geliþigüzel sürünüyor.
mobiles.description: The centipede doesn't really seem to notice you.

mobiles.name: hobgoblin
mobiles.long_description: Ýri bir hobgoblin seni koparýp koparamayacaðýný merak ediyor.
mobiles.description:
Red, bloodshot eyes and drool dripping from its mouth makes you
wonder just how far away you should be.

mobiles.name: ork
mobiles.long_description: Bir ork burada yiyecek birþey (ya da belki birisi) için bakýnýyor.
mobiles.description:
As you already know, orcs have quite a ravenous appetite.
Care to be dinner?

mobiles.name: aslan dað
mobiles.long_description: Bir dað aslaný yeni bir av için diþlerini yalýyor.
mobiles.description:
Huge claws and big teeth make quite a fearsome opponent for
the weary.  Are you next?

mobiles.name: dað dev
mobiles.long_description: Bir dað devi burada etrafýna kaya fýrlatýyor. Belki de mermer?
mobiles.description:
The hill giant looks like he's about 9 feet tall. By his actions you
come to the conclusion that he's not very intelligent.  A perfect
playmate for you.

mobiles.name: büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Küçük, zeki görünüþlü bir büyücü bir þeyler fýsýldamaya hazýrlanýyor.
mobiles.description: This guy can ace the SAT with his frontal lobe tied behind his back.

mobiles.name: rugar
mobiles.long_description: Bu iri görünümlü rugar sana daha yakýndan bakmayý düþünüyor.
mobiles.description:
Whilst you look at this asura, you realize he is trying to
figure just how tender you are.

mobiles.name: gardiyan yýlan
mobiles.long_description: Ýri yeþil bir yýlan birþeyleri koruyor.
mobiles.description:
You take a closer look at this large snake while it tries to
bite your head off!

mobiles.name: hýrsýz
mobiles.long_description: Tamamen siyahlar içinde bir hýrsýz.
mobiles.description: Well COUNT your money!

mobiles.name: ork
mobiles.long_description: Çirkin bir ork üzerinde pratik yapabileceði birilerini bekliyor.
mobiles.description: Yrkk..  He belches in your face!

mobiles.name: kýrkayak
mobiles.long_description: Küçük, zararsýz bir kýrkayak, burada yiyecek yeþillik arýyor.
mobiles.description:
It doesn't seem to pay any attention towards you.  You are probably
not important.

mobiles.name: savaþçý
mobiles.long_description: Bir insan savaþçý suratýna sinsi bir sýrýtýþ sallýyor.
mobiles.description: He doesn't look friendly at all...  He is no Mr. Rogers!

mobiles.name: kobold
mobiles.long_description: Yeþil bir kobold maðara duvarýnda topallarken sürekli kusuyor.
mobiles.description: It looks a little sick.  Something he ate maybe?

mobiles.name: mavi yarasa
mobiles.long_description: Mavi bir yarasa daireler çizerek uçarken elektrik akýmlarý oluþturuyor.
mobiles.description: Bzzzt.  Zap.  Crackle.  Speak about static electricity!

mobiles.name: kýrmýzý yarasa
mobiles.long_description: Kýrmýzý bir yarasa tavanda baþaþaðý asýlý duruyor ve parlýyor.
mobiles.description: You can definitely feel some heat from this thing.  A fever perhaps?

mobiles.name: yarasa yeþil
mobiles.long_description: Yeþil bir yarasa duvardan duvara uçarken berbat bir koku býrakýyor.
mobiles.description: Whew!  What a stinker!

mobiles.name: beyaz yarasa
mobiles.long_description: Beyaz bir yarasa tavanda dinleniyor. Bu soðuðun nereden geldiðini merak ediyorsun.
mobiles.description: Brrr!  You almost can't distinguish this bat from an ice cube.

mobiles.name: siyah yarasa
mobiles.long_description: Siyah bir yarasa duvarlarda uçarken geride týslayan bir sývý býrakýyor.
mobiles.description: Amazing!  This bat is grooming itself with acid!

mobiles.name: hýrsýz
mobiles.long_description: Sinsi bir hýrsýz gölgelerden ortaya çýkýyor ve yok oluyor.
mobiles.description: He definitely knows what he's doing.  Trust him.

mobiles.name: rugar
mobiles.long_description: Ýri çirkin bir rugar burada birþeyler mýrýldanýyor.
mobiles.description: He looks quite mean.  Don't mess with him.

mobiles.name: büyücü
mobiles.long_description: Küçük bir adam burada büyüler üzerine araþtýrma yapýyor.
mobiles.description:
His little head is buried into his magic books.  He'd be very
angry should you bother his studies.

mobiles.name: yýlan
mobiles.long_description: Kahverengi bir yýlan sana týslýyor.
mobiles.description:
Sickly brown as it is, you know what it really wants is you
for dinner.

mobiles.name: rugar
mobiles.long_description: 'Küçük' bir rugar burada neþeyle dans ediyor.  Trala-la-la.  La-la.
mobiles.description: He is so happy, you are disgusted.  Kill him now!

mobiles.name: ork
mobiles.long_description: Ýri bir ork suratýna hýrlýyor.
mobiles.description: He is just looking for a fight isn't he?

objects.name: sarý yeþil yüzük
objects.description: Sarý ve yeþil iþlemeli bir yüzük. Oldukça eski görünüyor.

extra_descriptions.description: It feels heavy.

objects.name: ceset
objects.description: Bir yerbilimcinin yarý çürümüþ cesedi.

extra_descriptions.description:
Ew.  This must have been the mapper that was lost in Moria.  His rotted hand
still clutches a partially digested map...

objects.name: sikke
objects.description: Küçük bir sikke yýðýný.

objects.name: hançer paslý
objects.description: Yýpranmýþ ve paslý bir hançer burada.

extra_descriptions.description: It's old and rusted, but it still has a good edge.

objects.name: kalýn kýrbaç
objects.description: Sarmalanmýþ deri bir sicim burada...tehlikeli bir kýrbaç gibi görünüyor!

objects.name: aðaç kalas kalýn
objects.description: Kökünden sökülmüþ bir aðaç, duvara yaslanmýþ.

extra_descriptions.description:
This is the biggest club you have ever seen!  The giant didn't even bother to
trim the roots off the end.

objects.name: kokmuþ post
objects.description: Kokmuþ bir post yýðýný burada duruyor.

extra_descriptions.description:
They're heavy and smelly and would probably slow you down...but they do look
like good armor.

objects.name: iksir mor
objects.description: Mor bir iksir burada duruyor.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks rather strange!

objects.name: metal miðfer
objects.description: metal bir miðfer burada.

objects.name: mantar
objects.description: Küçük bir mantar burada.

extra_descriptions.description: Let's put it this way - I wouldn't eat it !

objects.name: kama
objects.description: Kaliteli iþlenmiþ bir kama burada duruyor.

extra_descriptions.description:
It's a medium sized, beautifully crafted dirk made from grey alloy.
Its blade is double-edged and very thin ... this looks like a good
thieves weapon.

objects.name: balta savaþ
objects.description: Ustura gibi keskin bir savaþ baltasý yerde dinleniyor.

extra_descriptions.description: It has an edge sharp enough to cut a passing thought. A good find, this.

objects.name: pala
objects.description: Ýyi parlatýlmýþ bir pala burada duruyor.

extra_descriptions.description: It's much heavier than a long sword, but not as well balanced.

objects.name: baþlý iki topuz
objects.description: Ýki aðýr, sivri uçlu topuz burada duruyor.

extra_descriptions.description:
It's a stout wooden rod with two spiked balls attached, each weighing over 2
pounds.  It's a little worn for wear, but looks most painful.

objects.name: aðýr demir gürz
objects.description: Ýri demir bir gürz yerde dinleniyor.

extra_descriptions.description: A metal shaft mounted with an iron head, shaped into armor-shattering form.

objects.name: kýlýc pala
objects.description: Aðýr saplý kavisli bir kýlýc burada duruyor.

extra_descriptions.description:
It's curved like a scimitar, only with no recurved blade and a tip designed
for piercing as well as slashing.

objects.name: orak kargý
objects.description: Ucunda kavisli bir býçak bulunan bir kargý burada.

extra_descriptions.description:
It looks a lot like a staff with a pruning knife tied to the end, but it's
quite effective.

objects.name: siyah þeytan kýlýcý
objects.description: Uðursuz bir siyah þeytan kýlýcý burada.

extra_descriptions.description: You'll become as evil as the weapon, if you use it!

objects.name: eldivenleri
objects.description: Bir çift eldiven burada duruyor. Savaþ için doðru ekipmanlara benziyorlar.

objects.name: parþömen ysafg
objects.description: Üzerinde "ysafg" yazan bir parþömen, çok narin ve oldukça eski görünüyor.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks informative.

objects.name: balçýk küf
objects.description: Yeþil bir küf balçýðý burada. Bu gerçekten KÖTÜ kokuyor.

extra_descriptions.description: It wasn't meant to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

objects.name: balçýk küf
objects.description: Yeþil bir küf balçýðý burada. Bu gerçekten KÖTÜ kokuyor.

extra_descriptions.description: It wasn't meant to be food, - Certainly not for humans.

objects.name: demir kaplama kargý
objects.description: Demirle kaplanmýþ bir kargý duvara yaslanmýþ

extra_descriptions.description: It's a superb weapon for warrior or mage.

objects.name: iksir siyah
objects.description: Koyu siyah bir iksir burada.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks healthy.

objects.name: asa meþe
objects.description: Kadim, aðýr bir meþe asa burada.

extra_descriptions.description: The runes says : Funthark.
You see it has some sort of runes on it.

objects.name: gümüþ hafif hançer
objects.description: Hafif bir gümüþ hançer burada.

extra_descriptions.description: It looks like an excellent weapon for thieves.

objects.name: sabah sabahyýldýzý yýldýzý
objects.description: Aðýr, sivri bir sabah yýldýzý burada.

extra_descriptions.description:
It's a huge length of wood studded with iron spikes and bands. You wouldn't
want to meet this in a dark alley...

objects.name: ikinci harita moria
objects.description: Kývrýlmýþ bir harita burada.

extra_descriptions.description:
.
    * * * MORIA - Map 2 * * *
     = = =============== = =

Maze--Maze
 |     |    (Map 1)
 |    Maze--Tunnel*
 |
Maze--Maze--Maze--Maze
              |
     Large--Large
     Cave   Cave
      |       |
     Large--Large--Tunnel--End of
     Cave    Cave    |     Tunnel
                   *Hole
                  (Map 3)

objects.name: harita moria üçüncü
objects.description: Kývrýlmýþ bir harita burada.

extra_descriptions.description:
.
                                                   (Map 1*)
                             Long                     |
        Tunnel----Tunnel----Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel
          |                   |
          |                  Gold--Gold
          |                  Cave  Cave
          |                   |      |
          |                  Gold--Gold---Passage
          |                  Cave  Cave      |
          |                   |           Passage--Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel
          |          Dark*---Gold            |
          |         Passage  Cave            |     Secret
          |                               Passage  Chamber
          |                      Hole        |       |
          |                        |      Passage  Secret
        Large   Large   Large    Small       |     Chamber--Cave--Cave
        Tunnel--Tunnel--Tunnel--Passage      |                |      |
          |                        |      Passage-----------Cave--Cave
          |                       Long
          |                      Tunnel
         Wet    Small  Small       |
        Tunnel--Maze---Maze   Inscription
          |       |      |         |
         Wet    Small--Small-----Small
        Tunnel  Maze   Maze      Maze
          |       |                |
          |      Wet    Wet      End of
        Water    Maze---Maze-----Tunnel
          |       |      |
        Water---Water  End of
                       Maze*
                      (Map 2)

rooms.name: Selenge Çevresindeki Batý Patikasý
rooms.description:
You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard.
To the east the wall towers over you and to the west you see the
forest of Haon-Dor. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

exits.description: The dusty trail winds north closely to the wall.
The dusty trail leads to outside the west gate of Midgaard.

rooms.name: Selenge Çevresindeki Batý Patikasý
rooms.description:
You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard.
To the east the wall towers over you and to the west you see the
forest of Haon-Dor. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

exits.description: To the north you notice the path makes a turn, following the City wall.
The dusty trail continues towards the south.

rooms.name: Tozlu Patikanýn Kuzeybatý Köþesi
rooms.description:
You are standing outside the northwestern corner of the city wall.
The trail leads east following the north wall and south towards the gate.

exits.description: The dusty trail winds close up to the north wall of Midgaard.
The dusty trail leads south towards the gate.

rooms.name: Kuzey Duvarý Yanýndaki Tozlu Patika
rooms.description:
You are walking on the trail following the outside of Midgaard's
northern wall.

exits.description: The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.
The dusty trail turns left around the corner of the wall, behind it Haon-Dor.

rooms.name: Kuzey Duvarýný Takip Eden Tozlu Patika
rooms.description:
You are just outside the northern gate of Midgaard.  You can continue along
the trail to the east or west, head onwards to the plains of the north, or
enter Midgaard to the south.  You can just barely make out the buildings of
Midgaard from here, the Temple of Mota looks impressive even from this
distance.

exits.description: A small path extends into the plains.
The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.
You see the south gate of Midgaard.
The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.

rooms.name: Kuzey Duvarý Yanýndaki Tozlu Patika
rooms.description:
You are walking on the trail following the outside of Midgaard's
northern wall.

exits.description:
The dusty trail turns right around the corner of the wall.
You notice some mountains in the distance.
The dusty trail is winding along the north wall of Midgaard.

rooms.name: Tozlu Patikanýn Kuzeybatý Köþesi
rooms.description:
You are standing outside the northeastern corner of the city wall.
The trail leads west following the north wall and south towards the gate.

exits.description: The dusty trail leads south towards the gate.
The dusty trail winds close up to the north wall of Midgaard.

rooms.name: Selenge Çevresindeki Doðu Patikasý
rooms.description:
You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard.
To the west the wall towers over you and far to the east you see
some mountains. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

exits.description: To the north you notice the path makes a turn, following the City wall.
The dusty trail continues towards the south.

rooms.name: Selenge Çevresindeki Doðu Patikasý
rooms.description:
You are on a dusty trail following the outside wall of Midgaard.
To the west the wall towers over you and far to the east you see
some mountains. The trail leads north and south along the wall.

exits.description: The dusty trail winds north closely to the wall.
The dusty trail leads to outside the east gate of Midgaard.

rooms.name: Tepeler
rooms.description:
You are on a small bewildered path winding its way between the hills in
lack of better things to do. To the south you have a splendid view over the
flat, vast, desolate plains. To the north the hills grow steadily darker and
foreboding. This is the cause of no sunset, it is rather the power of evil
penetrating these quiet hills. Glancing around you notice only a single bird.
The mountains of the dwarven kingdom rise up to your east, you can barely
make out the queen's mines from here.

exits.description: You see the mountains of the dwarven kingdom.

rooms.name: Tepeler
rooms.description:
You are surrounded by dark and sinister hills. Although they seemed fairly
small from a distance you now get the feeling that they're closing in on you,
towering over you, overwhelming you ...  The small path seems to have second
thoughts about these hills because it starts winding unnecessarily, turning
several times around itself.  To the south the hills have a lighter hue of
dark. To the north however, the hills have become nightblack holes in the
distant mountains.

rooms.name: Yolun Sonu
rooms.description:
At this point the path has had enough. With a terrified shudder it cowers
to the ground, only staying here because you're standing on it. with a slight
feeling of unease you look around noticing only a few bushes and a large sign
carved into the mountain.  You feel you can hear the cry of help from a
thousand silent voices all coming from an even darker hole in the mountain to
the north marking the entrance to a cave (or a grave :-).

extra_descriptions.description:
The sign says:

        /---------------------\
        | The Mines of Moria! |
        |                     |
        | Four levels.        |
        |                     |
        | Watch for mages!    |
        |                     |
        \---------------------/
                 | |
                 | |
                 | |
                 | |
                 | |
Small crippled bushes desperately trying to grow south.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a large cave. The ceiling is lost somewhere above the reach of
your light. The floor, however, is highly illuminated, your light flickering
over several tombstones. Only one is whole, the rest have been shattered by
some savage blow. The remaining tombstone looks disturbingly new...
A small breeze of fresh air enters from the south (probably lost too). Take a
good breath, it may be your last mouthful of air in a long, long time that
others haven't breathed before you.
To the north a small tunnel continues into the mountain.

extra_descriptions.description:
The stone is inscribed with the unfortunate player's famous last words:

  "What are you worrying about, it is just a small harmless snake"

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You squeeze your way through a small, narrow tunnel. The sharp-edged rocks
protruding from the walls threaten to scratch and cut you.
To the south you sense a freshness in the air which is rather unusual in these
damp, stuffy tunnels. To the north the tunnel continues.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a part of the tunnel that looks uncannily like the rest except
that it goes in a east-north direction. To the north the tunnel widens into
a cave.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
This tunnel, leading east-west, seems seldom used.  A thick layer of dust
covers the floor, making the air stuffy and dry.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are walking in a narrow tunnel. The walls are only roughly shaped,
sharp rocks protruding everywhere, even from the floor making you stumble in
the flickering light. To the south the tunnel narrows even more making it
almost impossible to pass. To the north it slowly widens into a cave. There
is a branch of the tunnel going west.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are in a corner tunnel leading west and north.

rooms.name: Geniþ Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a large cave, the cave continues east and west, to the south
you notice a small tunnel.

rooms.name: Geniþ Maðara
rooms.description: You are in the east end of the large cave.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in the south end of a cave, to the south you see a tunnel. You
notice a large pile of bones in the corner.

extra_descriptions.description: Some of the bones are human!

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are in a north-south leading tunnel.

rooms.name: Oyuk
rooms.description: You are by a hole in the floor, you can leave down, or north.

rooms.name: Oyuk
rooms.description: A hole in the floor leads down here.

rooms.name: Rutubetli Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a damp tunnel.  Your clothes feel wet.  The tunnel continues
to the north; to the west you see a hole in the floor; and to the east
there is a large cave.

rooms.name: Geniþ Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in the western part of the large cave, to the south you see
a damp tunnel.

rooms.name: Rutubetli Tünel
rooms.description: You are in a corner of a damp tunnel.  You can go west or south.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description: You are in the north end of a cave.  To the east you see many tunnels.

rooms.name: Birçok Tünel
rooms.description: You are at the intersection of many tunnels.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you also notice a tunnel to
the west. From the north you sense the fresh air!

rooms.name: Pis Kokulu Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a north-south leading tunnel, you see a small light
to the north. You notice a strange smell from the north..

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a cave that is filled with fresh air, you sense the
wind blowing from the north. To the south you see a small tunnel
continue into the mountain.

rooms.name: Aydýnlýk Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a light cave, through a hole large above you, you see
the sky. A small tunnel to the south is the only way out.

rooms.name: Vadi
rooms.description:
You are in a small valley, surrounded by hills and a mountain to
the south. In the mountain there is a cave.

extra_descriptions.description: Well it doesn't look nice, but it's the only way out.

rooms.name: Dað Eteði
rooms.description:
You are on a winding path that leads through the foothills on the
other side of the mountain.  The path continues north.

rooms.name: Dað Eteðindeki Kesiþme
rooms.description:
The small path you are following splits here.  The path continues
north and south or you can follow a trail east into the mountains.

rooms.name: Dað Eteðinin Yeþil Bölgesi
rooms.description:
The grass here is unusually high.  You notice several areas where
someone or something large has crushed spots of the grass down.  Several very
large rocks litter this area.  You can go north, west or south.

rooms.name: Dað Eteðinin Bitimi
rooms.description:
At this point you are leaving the foothills.  You see a plains area
to the north of here.  You can spot a small city in the distance from
here.

rooms.name: Ovalar
rooms.description: The plains.  Exits are south.

exits.keyword: The path to the Craggy Tor

rooms.name: Dað Eteði Patikasý
rooms.description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.name: Daðýn etekleri
rooms.description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.name: A trail up the mountain
rooms.description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.name: The mountain top.
rooms.description: Exits are north, east, and west.

exits.description: It doesn't look safe this way.

rooms.name: The lion's den
rooms.description: Exits are south.

rooms.name: The level foothills
rooms.description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.name: The cave entrance
rooms.description: Exits are east and west.

rooms.name: The hill giant cave
rooms.description: Exits are east.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: The tunnel turns here, continuing to the east and south.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are in a narrow east-west tunnel.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are at a turn, the tunnel continues south and west.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are at a turn, the tunnel continues north and east.

rooms.name: Aydýnlýk Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a cave, to south from you there is a large fire that lights
the entire cave, to the east and west tunnels leads off.

rooms.name: Labirent
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.  The only exit is west.

rooms.name: Aydýnlýk Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a light cave, a large fire in front of you lights the room.
The cave continues to the north and south.

rooms.name: Labrient
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

rooms.name: Labrient
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a tunnel, only exit is to the east. You sense that the
tunnel leads slightly down.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a small tunnel, to the west the tunnel continues and
to the east you see some light.

rooms.name: Aydýnlýk Maðara
rooms.description: You are in the south end of a light cave.

rooms.name: Labrient
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

rooms.name: Labrient
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are at the eastern end of a tunnel.

rooms.name: Labrient
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

rooms.name: Labrient
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

rooms.name: Labrient
rooms.description: You are in a maze of small damp tunnels.

rooms.name: Geniþ Maðara
rooms.description: You are in the northwest end of a large cave.

rooms.name: Geniþ Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in the northeast end of a large cave. To the north the
is a small damp tunnel.

rooms.name: Geniþ Maðara
rooms.description: You are in the southwest end of a large cave.

rooms.name: Geniþ Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in the southeast end of a large cave. To the east you
notice a small tunnel.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a narrow tunnel, which leads both to the east and the
south. There is also an exit towards the west, where you see a large
cave.

rooms.name: Tünelin Sonu
rooms.description: The tunnel stops here.

rooms.name: Oyuk
rooms.description:
You are at a small hole in the floor, you can either leave north
or try your luck and leave down into the unknown!

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: Suddenly you feel that the tunnel leads slightly down.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel is quite
wide at this point.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel becomes
narrow to the west.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel is quite
narrow at this point. You notice a small hole leading south.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a long east-west leading tunnel. The tunnel starts sloping
down towards the west.

rooms.name: Altýn Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the south and west.

rooms.name: Altýn Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the south and east, to the north is a narrow
tunnel.

rooms.name: Dar Geçit
rooms.description:
You are in a small passage, it leads south, to the west is a golden
cave.

rooms.name: Altýn Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the north and west, east from you there is
a small passage.

rooms.name: Altýn Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the south, east and north.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are at the end of the tunnel.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are in a small tunnel, it leads from east to the west.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You are in a larger tunnel, it leads from west to east.

rooms.name: Dar Geçit
rooms.description:
You are in a passage that leads towards the south. To the east
you see a tunnel.

rooms.name: Altýn Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a giant cave, all the walls are shining with a soft golden
light. The cave continues to the north, to the west you see a dark
passage.

rooms.name: Karanlýk Geçit
rooms.description:
You are in a dark passage, that leads east. In the ceiling you notice
a small hole, just big enough to pass through.

rooms.name: Dar Geçit
rooms.description:
You are in a passage that leads north-south. You notice a small
light to the south.

rooms.name: Gizli Oda
rooms.description: You are in a secret chamber.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the west and south.
To the north a small hole leads to a tunnel.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the east and south.

rooms.name: Dar Geçit
rooms.description: You are in a north-south leading passage. To the south you see light.

rooms.name: Gizli Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a secret tunnel that leads west, you feel evilness
approaching you as you continue west.

rooms.name: Gizli Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a secret chamber, the room is filled with an evil
feeling.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the north and west.

rooms.name: Maðara
rooms.description:
You are in a light cave, from torches several feet above your
head fire lights the room. The cave continues to the east and north.
To the west a passage leads north.

rooms.name: Dar Geçit
rooms.description:
You are in a passage, to the east you see a cave. Light from the
cave lights up the passage. To the north the passage leads into
the darkness.

rooms.name: Karanlýk Oyuk
rooms.description:
You are standing at a hole, a small passage leads south. You see
some inscriptions on the wall, most of 'em the usual stuff, like:
'Super Snude was here' and 'Why does the mayor likes secretaries with
small hands?' - But one inscription gets your attention, it says:
The Balrog is ALIVE ...

rooms.name: Küçük Geçit
rooms.description:
You are in a small passage, to the north you see a hole, and to
the south you see a large tunnel. The air is damp in this area.

rooms.name: Tünel
rooms.description: You suddenly feel that the tunnel leads down.

rooms.name: Geniþ Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a large tunnel leading from the south to the east. The
air is damp in the area.

rooms.name: Geniþ Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a large east-west leading tunnel, the air is damp and
the floor is wet.

rooms.name: Geniþ Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a large tunnel, the tunnel leads west, and to the east
you notice a long tunnel. The air is damp in this area.

rooms.name: Uzun Tünel
rooms.description: You are standing in a long north-south tunnel.

rooms.name: Rutubetli Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a wet, north-south leading tunnel, the floor is
partly covered by water.

rooms.name: Küçük Labirent
rooms.description:
You are in a small maze, exits leads off to the east,  south
and west. The floor is partly covered by water.

rooms.name: Küçük Labirent
rooms.description:
You are in a small maze, exits leads off only to the south
and west. The air is damp in this maze.

rooms.name: Tünelde Yazýtlar...
rooms.description:
You are in a north-south leading tunnel, the air is damp. On
the wall there is an inscription.

extra_descriptions.description:
It says:

    Year 631 after the destruction of the dwarven realm.

  We found the sword of the dwarven king, but it was guarded
by a large green dragon. All but two died immediately as the
dragon breathed poison gas; we are also going to die soon.

       Trather and Oralane

rooms.name: Rutubetli Tünel
rooms.description:
You are in a north-south leading tunnel.  The floor is fully
covered by water.

rooms.name: Küçük Labirent
rooms.description:
You are in a small maze. The floor is mainly covered by
water, exits leads north, east and south.

rooms.name: Küçük Labirent
rooms.description:
You are in a small maze, where the air is damp. Exits
leads to the north and east.

rooms.name: Küçük Labirente Giriþ
rooms.description:
You are in a north-south leading tunnel, and the air is damp.
To the west you see a small maze.

rooms.name: Suyun Ýçinde
rooms.description:
You are standing in water, the tunnel continues both to the
north and south.

rooms.name: Rutubetli Labirent
rooms.description:
You are in a part of the maze where the floor is fully covered
by water. The maze continues to the north, east and south.

rooms.name: Rutubetli Labirent
rooms.description:
You are in a small maze, the floor is covered by water, the
maze continues east, west and south.

rooms.name: Tünelin Sonu
rooms.description:
The tunnel suddenly stops here, only exit is to the west.
The air is damp here.

rooms.name: Suyun Ýçinde
rooms.description: You are standing in the water, exits leads both north and east.

rooms.name: Suyun Ýçinde
rooms.description: You are standing in the water, it continues east and west.

rooms.name: Labirentin Sonu
rooms.description:
You are at the end of the small maze which continues north.
Above you a hole leads up.

rooms.name: Kum Bariyeri
rooms.description: You are on a little sand bar in the water.
